00090 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00091 
00097 
00098 double RastriginFunction::calculateEvaluation(void)
00099 {
00100    // Control sentence (if debug)
00101 
00102    #ifndef NDEBUG 
00103 
00104    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00105    {
00106       std::cerr << std::endl
00107                 << "Flood Error: RastriginFunction class." << std::endl
00108                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00109                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00110                 << std::endl;
00111 
00112         exit(1);
00113    }
00114 
00115    #endif
00116 
00117    numberOfEvaluations++;
00118 
00119    double evaluation = 0.0;
00120 
00121    const double pi = 3.1415927;
00122 
00123    Vector<double> argument = multilayerPerceptron->getIndependentParameters();
00124 
00125    evaluation = 10.0*numberOfVariables;
00126 
00127    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfVariables; i++)
00128    {
00129       evaluation += pow(argument[i], 2) - 10.0*cos(2.0*pi*argument[i]);
00130    }
00131 
00132    return(evaluation);
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 // Vector<double> calculateGradient(void) method
00137 
00143 
00144 Vector<double> RastriginFunction::calculateGradient(void)
00145 {
00146    Vector<double> gradient(numberOfVariables);
00147 
00148    const double pi = 3.1415927;
00149 
00150    Vector<double> argument = multilayerPerceptron->getIndependentParameters();
00151 
00152    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfVariables; i++)
00153    {
00154       gradient[i] = 2.0*argument[i] + 10.0*sin(2.0*pi*argument[i])*2.0*pi;
00155    }
00156 
00157    return(gradient);
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 // Matrix<double> calculateHessian(void) method
00162 
00168 
00169 Matrix<double> RastriginFunction::calculateHessian(void)
00170 {
00171    Matrix<double> hessian(numberOfVariables, numberOfVariables);
00172 
00173    const double pi = 3.1415927;
00174 
00175    Vector<double> argument = multilayerPerceptron->getIndependentParameters();
00176 
00177    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfVariables; i++)
00178    {
00179       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfVariables; j++)
00180       {
00181          if(i == j)
00182          {
00183             hessian[i][j] = 2.0 + 10.0*cos(2.0*pi*argument[i])*4.0*pow(pi,2);
00184          }
00185          else
00186          {
00187             hessian[i][j] = 0.0;
00188          }
00189       }
00190    }
00191 
00192    return(hessian);
00193 }
00194 
00195 
00196 // Matrix<double> calculateInverseHessian(void) method
00197 
00203 
00204 Matrix<double> RastriginFunction::calculateInverseHessian(void)
00205 {
00206    Matrix<double> inverseHessian(numberOfVariables, numberOfVariables);
00207 
00208    const double pi = 3.1415927;
00209 
00210    Vector<double> argument = multilayerPerceptron->getIndependentParameters();
00211 
00212    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfVariables; i++)
00213    {
00214       for(int j = 0; j < numberOfVariables; j++)
00215       {
00216          if(i == j)
00217          {
00218             inverseHessian[i][j] = 1.0/(2.0 + 10.0*cos(2.0*pi*argument[i])*4.0*pow(pi,2));
00219          }
00220          else
00221          {
00222             inverseHessian[i][j] = 0.0;
00223          }
00224       }
00225    }
00226 
00227    return(inverseHessian);
00228 }
